00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace RPrimitive {
00026     
00027     struct RDouble: public RPrimitive<double> {
00028         RDouble() : unit(REAL) { }
00029         RDouble(double a) : RPrimitive<double>(a), unit(REAL) { }
00030 
00031         enum Unit {
00033             REAL = 0,        
00034             PERC = 1,        
00035             M = 3,           
00036             M_SEC = 4,       
00037             M_SEC2 = 5,      
00038             SEC = 7,         
00039             RAD = 8,         
00040             RAD_SEC = 9,     
00041             RAD_SEC2 = 10,   
00042             CELSIUS = 12,    
00043             PIXELS = 13,     
00044             OTHER = 99,      
00045 
00047             MM = 100,        
00048             MM_SEC = 101,    
00049             MM_CYCLE = 102,  
00050             MM_SEC2 = 103,   
00051             DEG_CYCLE = 104, 
00052             DEG = 105,       
00053             DEG_SEC = 106,   
00054             MS = 107,        
00055             M_CYCLE = 108,   
00056             RAD_CYCLE = 109, 
00057             PERC_CYCLE = 110 
00058         } unit;
00059 
00060         RDouble(double a, Unit u) : RPrimitive<double>(a), unit(u) { }
00061

00068
